Name: Hasted
Description: This enemy moves and acts faster

Name: Regenerating
Description: This enemy regenerates health each turn

Name: Reflective
Description: This enemy reflects damage back to attackers

Name: Tough
Description: This enemy has significantly more health

Name: Elusive
Description: This enemy is harder to hit

Name: Critical
Description: This enemy has increased critical strike chance and multiplier

Name: Elemental
Description: This enemy has high elemental resistances

Name: Loot-Rich
Description: This enemy drops significantly more items

Name: Treasure-Hunter
Description: This enemy drops much rarer items

Name: Plunderer
Description: This enemy drops both more and rarer items
